resources.string: Could not connect to host. System message:\n%1$s
I cannot create the "heroes gather here" service. There\'s nothing I can do about it.\n(Error %1$s)
Looks like Network Service Discovery is unavailable. I require this thing to let your friends join the party.
This does not look like a valid port number. Ports are usually between 1024 and 65535. Try again.
Unable to connect to the specified host. Make sure you\'re specifying a valid host and the host is reachable (\'thethering\' will help). Try again.
Failed to parse server reply. This server is incompatible.
Server replied in an unexpected way. This server is incompatible.
group protocol is more recent, please update this installation
group protocol is obsolete, please update party owner installation
To join a group, write a message to party owner. You must do that at least once.
Wait until party owner confirms you being in the group.
Failed to get network information. This isn\'t really a problem but you\'ll have to find this device network address in some other way in case your friends need explicit connection data.
"An error occurred while attempting to start accepting connections. I suggest to start again, possibly after rebooting device."
A device tried to connect to the group but something went wrong in the process.
Lost connection to device managing characters %1$s.
Lost connection to device, last words: %1$s
Connection to server lost or closed unexpectedly.
Server is running protocol %1$d but client requires %2$d.\nPlease update %3$s device.
"Error detected while attempting to send message to party owner. Details: "
Message too long. It might be displayed partially or not at all. Go back and fit the given budget.
This device connection will be terminated. The device can still attempt to join again, this is just a temporary ban.
Disconnected from a party before I could identify it.
Could not switch to playing character definition mode. I suggest starting from scratch. Details:\n%1$s
Party owner just tried to redefine key for the active group. This is very odd and might result in malfunctions.
You were accepted in some other group than the one you\'re on already. I\'ll just ignore this, carry on. Try to join a single group next time (in doubt, try explicit connection)
Health points must be a number.\n
Experience points must be a number.\n
Failed to send character data to party owner, detailed error follows:\n
Players can now define playing characters. They can define more than one for each device part of the group.\nTheir characters will appear below.
Bad character: experience must be positive.
Bad character: health points must be at least 1.
Bad character: must have a name.
Bad character: level must be at least 1.
Could not build party key. This is based on internal machinery which was supposed to be here by the standard, something is very wrong.
File exists but cannot be read. This is unlikely to happen by accident so you\'re better check your system is fine.
Failed to read groups from storage.
Group data archive exceeds maximum size.
group version 0 should have never been saved.
Group %1$d clashes with %2$d, both are named \"%3$s\".
Group key %1$d clashes with %2$d, both are named \"%3$s\" and have the same key!
failed to output data serialization, that was not supposed to happen and needs further investigation.
could not get an output stream to save new group definitions. This was not supposed to happen.
Failed to write new group definitions. Maybe you are just low on storage?
Failed to load already existing data. New data will not be saved to preserve previous contents. Details: %1$s
Data successfully saved to internal storage. Do you want to go adventuring right away?
Could not store new group data. Error: %1$s
failed to delete previous contents, new data will be discarded to maintain the old.
Failed to rename new data to override old. Old data storage has been destroyed but data itself is preserved.
Searching for parties. Found parties will appear below.
Send a message to a party to join. The message will be displayed only to party owner to identify you.
Cannot find your party? Try an explicit connection!
You will advance to next step automatically as soon as the party is formed.
Could not bind to the cross-activity data sharing service. This is required for everything else to work.
Network discovery failed to start. You can still join a group by attempting an explicit connection.
Lost connection to group \"%1$s\", reason given: %2$s.
Lost handle over the cross-activity data sharing service. This is required to work.
Could not bind to the cross-activity data sharing service. This is required for everything else to work so the app will now quit.
Lost handle over the cross-activity data sharing service. Nothing else will work without it so the app will now close.
Could not connect to specified device. Check your input is correct and the device is reachable: it must be on the same Wi-Fi network! Not sure? Try using \"tethering\".
I found a party named \"%1$s\" here but it is not accepting new players. You might have to talk to your friend about this.
The information you need here can be found at the bottom of the screen on party owner device.
Could not send HELLO to host. System message:\n%1$s
Failed to load owned party data. This is required for the app to function. Ignoring this will only make the problem worse so the app will now close.
Loaded party owner data is version %1$d. Current version is %2$d so data should be upgraded but no upgrading is possible yet. Continue at your own risk.
Loaded client data is version %1$d. Current version is %2$d so data should be upgraded but no upgrading is possible yet. Continue at your own risk.
Inconsistent party data loaded. You can proceed at your own risk making the problem worse. List of errors:%1$s
Additionally, %1$d exception(s) were thrown while disposing of the communication channels.
It seems I had to go with a newly created party but I couldn\'t match it. This is a very serious error.%1$s
Every party needs a name.\nYour friends need to know which party to join and I need a name to store party data you can later retrieve.
A party with the same name already exists. Names must be unique.
Give your new party a name.
Connected devices will be listed below. Select the devices to let in the group.
Cannot open communication so your friend\'s devices can connect. This is very serious and prevents anything from working.
Could not publish the group to wi-fi. Your friends can still connect but only using explicit connections.
An error occurred while connecting a new device. Maybe the network is broken or I am low on resources. Consider restarting.
Lost connection to whoever sent the message \"%1$s\". You can ignore this issue.
There is a single device in the group.
There are %1$d devices in the group.
%1$s This operation cannot be reverted. Once you go ahead adding more players will require to restart.
Failed to generate secret key for new party. Something is very wrong with this system. Try rebooting.
Lost connection to device \"%1$s\" %2$s. You can continue ignoring some errors, the group will still be formed and the device can later join anyway.
We\'re almost done. Check all the playing characters are defined and accepted.
Define as many characters as you want. The process will complete when party owner decides so.

Lost connection to party owner device. This is a fatal error and cannot be currently recovered. If you already proposed your characters the party owner might be able to make it anyway, otherwise you\'ll have to start from scratch.
Party successfully formed. I will now save some data and take you back to main menu.
Party owner is starting a new session right away! See you there!
Character \"%1$s\" was rejected. You can modify something and retry.
Parties generated and stored on this device. You have full control and you can host games.
This device holds a key allowing you to join games as a player.
Tap on a party overview to show information and actions here.
I am rewriting storage data so I cannot let you go away. By the time you have read this, I\'ve hopefully finished.
Cannot save new data. Old data refused to go away.
Oh no! New data was successfully produced and stored but couldn\'t be given its real name and old data is already gone!\nFile:\n %1$s
